title: Subconscious Cruelty - Karim Hussain (Swedish 2-disc)
description:
Subconscious Cruelty - Karim Hussain 1999 <a href="
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0166370/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0166370/</a>

Extremely beutiful movie with fantastic photo and a surreal and haunting feeling throughout the whole movie. Especially in the first "Episode"..

I will not describe the movie or the story, if you want to know the plot and how the movie is before seeing it, check the IMDB link above. 

Ripped from the Swedish "6-disc Karim Hussain Boxset" including Ascension and The Beautiful Beast. 
And -yes-, all three films, including the extra-discs will be uploaded in a week or so. :)

Encoded with DVD shrink. Disc 1 with the mainfilm is untouched but disc 2 is shrinked from around 5GB so it will fit a DVD5

Picture: Fullscreen 1.33:1

Sound: DD2.0

Subtitles: Swedish, Finnish, Danish and Norwegian

Format: PAL

Extras:

# Making of documantary - 77 min
# Audiocommentary by Karim
# Deleted scenes with audiocommentary by Karim - 20 min
# Short film - Facts are Saftey - 6 min / Dir: N.Debot, Photo: K.Hussain
# Gallery
# Original trailers to Karim Hussain movies
# Njutafilms trailer show

See this upload a a "try before buy" and -support- the small DVD companies, in this case Swedish Njutafilms. ( www.njutafilms.nu ) 

We should all appreciate the hard work and money spent to release quality films by buying the movies you like after downloading them.. 

Enjoy!
